includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Saga adjusts to life with a new partner as they work on the case of a murdered gender theorist. BAFTA-nominated Scandinavian crime thriller. Foreign language with English subtitles.

includedIn.title: The Bridge
includedIn.synopsis: When a body is found lying across the Danish/Swedish border, two detectives - one from each nation - are forced to work together to solve the case.
